Class TabHeaders

The TabHeaders component contains the Tab items and controls scroll functionality if content has overflow.

Hierarchy

  • TabHeaders

Implements

  • AfterContentInit
  • OnChanges
  • OnInit

cacheActive

@Input()
cacheActive: boolean = false
  • Defined in src/tabs/tab-headers.component.ts:143

Set to 'true' to have Tab items cached and not reloaded on tab switching. Duplicate from n-tabs to support standalone headers

followFocus

@Input()
followFocus: boolean
  • Defined in src/tabs/tab-headers.component.ts:147

Set to 'true' to have tabs automatically activated and have their content displayed when they receive focus.
